description: Number of classes generated by function A001221 when applied to binomial coefficients.
formula: a(n) = Length[ Union[ Table[ A001221[ binomial[ n, k ] ], {k, 0, n} ] ] ]
example: For n=9 A001221({C(9,k)})={0,1,2,3,3,3,3,2,1,0} includes 4 distinct values so generating 4 classes of k values: {0,9},{1,8},{2,7} and {3,4,5,6}. So a(9)=4
author: _Labos Elemer_
